Change of Leadership at KOFC

  • John Doe
  • Jan 1, 2022
  • 12 Comments

On June 5, 2023, KOFC experienced a leadership transition. Major General Dennis Kamuri assumed the role of Managing Director, succeeding Major General Martin Kizito Ong'oyi, who had served since 2020. This change followed Major General Kamuri's promotion from Brigadier, as announced by President William Ruto.
